raw_comment: I noticed that there are a good amount of players of color and that each league has different percentages. I wonder why there are more colored payers then colored coaches on these league teams. This impacts my community by showing other people that they can make it into a league team. they might not have the highest chance in getting one but if they try and are good they have a pretty good chance.
ace_sentences: I noticed that there are many players of color.
Each league has a different percentage of players of color.
I wonder why there are more players of color than coaches of color in these league teams.
This situation shows other people that they can join a league team.
Some people might not have the highest chance to join a league team.
If a person tries and the person is good then the person has a pretty good chance to join a league team.
